TextBlock.Text: KEEK: A quick reminder for anyone on material transport duty: don't take the exterior exits from this seed.
KEEK: Any size changes as a result of crossing the thresholds between seeds will normally be undone if you return the way you came.
KEEK: You might not even notice the changes normally, but conveniently for us, this seed is connected a little differently than most.
KEEK: Using this method should make transporting materials to <color=orange>Hopper Town</color> easy as Pi.
